org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions

Class VariableBasedAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions.VariableBasedAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadFullValueAction, OpenFunctionAction, WatchPropertyDescriptor

    public abstract class VariableBasedAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Base implementation for generic actions for Variables and Expressions views. Its inner state is Runnable value: on selection change runnable is calculated, if it's null action is disabled; if it's not-null action is enabled and can be executed.
